document.full_text: less than a week before taking office, chicago mayor-elect rahm emanuel on tuesday released a transition plan that takes aim at a structural budget deficit that it says is on track to top $1 billion in a few years.
document.title: chicago mayor-elect takes aim at growing deficit
lines_and_colors: less than a week before taking office, chicago mayor-elect rahm emanuel on tuesday released a transition plan that takes aim at a structural budget deficit that it says is on track to top $1 billion in a few years.
